messages.content: Every vote for Nick Varley here is a vote to strengthen Theresa May's hand when negotiating our exit from the European Union.
Nick Varley, as part of Theresa May's team, is the only candidate who can stop Jeremy Corbyn getting into 10 Downing Street.
Theresa May and Nick Varley will secure the strong economy we need to continue funding our schools, NHS and public services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Strengthening Theresa May's hand when negotiating our exit from the European Union.
Securing the strong economy needed to continue funding schools, NHS and public services.
